testcase.name: getallStudents

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: object has missing required properties (["marks"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"#","pointer":""} instance: {"pointer":""} domain: "validation" keyword: "required" required: ["courses","email","firstName","lastName","marks","programme"] missing: ["marks"]
Actual: {"id":96,"firstName":"Gavin","lastName":"Driscoll","email":"lacinia.mattis@risusDonec.net","programme":"Medicine","courses":["Anatomy","Biochemistry","Genetics","Human Behavior."]}
